Name: 16_metric_groups_similarity_subgroup
Representative_Docs: ['the following is an overview of the three levels of granularity group bias the purpose of testing for group level bias is to assess that the groups of interest which can be groups of people or groups of items have the desired metric outputs whether it is having similar or different outputs', 'individual bias the purpose of testing for individual level bias is to assess that the similar individuals in subgroup or group have the desired metric outputs or ais outputs or both', 'subgroup bias the purpose of testing for subgroup level bias is to assess that the subgroups within group have the desired metric outputs whether it is having similar or different outputs']
